heading: Front-end Engineering Intern
lists: Collaborated with a cross-functional team of designers, back-end developers, and a product manager to create interactive features and functionality, enhancing the overall usability and performance of a fintech App.
Optimized the front-end codebase by refactoring and implementing efficient coding practices, resulting in a 20% improvement in page load times and overall application performance.
Successfully integrated third-party APIs and libraries, such as payment gateways and data visualization tools, into the fintech app, expanding its functionality and enhancing user interactions.
Provide leadership within the development department through close collaboration, knowledge shares, and mentorship

heading: Front-end Engineering Intern
lists: Interning here equipped me with a deep understanding of agile methodologies, various front-end frameworks, and API integration, enabling me to deliver high-quality, user-centric solutions in a collaborative team environment.
Developed responsive web pages and optimized it's user experience across different devices, enhancing accessibility and usage using HTML, CSS, and ReactJS.
Worked closely with the back-end development team to design and consume REST APIs, ensuring seamless data retrieval and synchronization between the app's front-end and back-end components

heading: Software Engineer (Front-end)
lists: Collaborated with a team of software developers to build modern and responsive full stack software applications using tools like: JavaScript, React, Node, Express, MongoDB, HTML, TypeScript.
Conducted thorough testing and debugging to ensure high-quality code and optimal performance for a for a full-stack web application.
Proactively identified and resolved technical issues and bugs, minimizing project delays and improving overall efficiency.

heading: Learning - Facilitator
lists: As a passionate tech enthusiast and advocate for nurturing young talents, I had the incredible opportunity to participate in a rewarding program aimed at introducing children to the fascinating world of technology.
During this program, I served as a facilitator, guiding and inspiring this group of bright young minds who were just beginning their journey in the realm of tech.

My primary role was to teach the fundamentals of web development, focusing on HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It was truly fulfilling to witness the enthusiasm and curiosity in the eyes of these young learners as they absorbed the knowledge I shared with them.
